maybe its proper launch smoke?

i wish.

Is it an update to Unity Pro, with proper dynamic lighting?
Trajectories is my guess
Saving of craft rotation. In game saves, when craft exit the phisics bubble and rotation maintained in time warp would be good too.
Keyboard (and mouse) controls info is my guess. It would really help a novice to have that displayed or easily accessible. And as a pure bit of info adding it ought to need little testing.
